verb.description: Go around from one place to another, in the pursuit of pleasure or entertainment.
examples: help out around the house and not be gadding about the countryside

proper noun.description: (in the Bible) a Hebrew patriarch, son of Jacob and Zilpah (Gen. 30:9–11).

exclamation.description: An expression of surprise or emphatic assertion.
examples: By Gad! You look young for a doctor!

origin: Late 15th century: euphemistic alteration of God.
